full_summary:
### Request for Information: Conservation Economy Assessment for Potential Candidate Sites

#### Request Number
5P420-23-0024/A

#### Publication Date
2023-05-31

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-06-30T16:00:00

#### Request Description

Parks Canada Agency invites responsive suppliers to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) regarding a conservation economy assessment for potential candidate sites. The RFI aims to identify best practices and methods for evaluating the viability of conservation economy initiatives in areas north of 55.

#### Background

To achieve its goal of protecting 25% of Canada's lands and waters by 2025 and 30% by 2030, Parks Canada has set a target of establishing 10 new national parks/national park reserves by 2026. As part of the establishment process, feasibility assessments will be conducted to determine the suitability of candidate areas. The conservation economy approach is a new concept that may offer a viable tool for social and economic development during this process.

#### Purpose of the RFI

This RFI is not a bid solicitation, and it will not result in the award of any contract. The purpose of this RFI is to gather information, comments, and feedback from responsive suppliers regarding the conservation economy assessment process.

#### Expected Outcomes

The RFI will inform potential feasibility studies for candidate areas and provide insights into the scope and potential of the conservation economy as a viable tool for social and economic development. The results of this RFI may be used to develop or modify procurement strategies or draft documents.

#### Submission Requirements

Responses to this RFI should be submitted electronically in either official language of Canada. The RFI package is available for download at [insert URL].

#### Response Format

Please submit your response in the following format:

* Title Page: Include the name and address of the respondent, the date, and the RFI number.
* Annex A: Provide responses to the questions and comments.
* Any additional pages or annexes may be attached for additional comments or technical specifications.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this RFI, please contact:
Ryan Taylor
Email: ryan.taylor@pc.gc.ca
Phone: (587) 436-5987

#### Disclaimer

Please note that this RFI is a non-binding process, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. There is no source list associated with this RFI, and suppliers
